title: ‘You don’t deserve this’; overseas couple on Sri Lanka’s fuel crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); You don’t deserve it, were the comments made by an overseas couple living in Sri Lanka on the ongoing fuel crisis that has grappled the island nation.
They said they were waiting in line for almost three hours on Tuesday (12) at a filling station, and when it was their turn, the filling station had run out of fuel for their car.
‘You don’t deserve this’; overseas couple on Sri Lanka’s fuel crisis
